Desde que lo había visto en la XBOX360 había querido jugarlo mas nunca lo compre por el Xbox pues estaba algo caro y no tenia el presupuesto necesario y estaba chica, se me había olvidado completamente la existencia de este juego hasta que abrí steam después de como 2 años sin abrirlo, y estaba en mis deseados, ahora que tengo dinero y lo he comprado aparte de y saberme un poco el lore y todo sigue siendo entretenido de jugar, lo recomiendo muchísimo.

Really enjoyable, I regret sleeping on the Portal games for as long as I did. 10/10 highly recommend!

My review is spoiler free!

Absolutely love Portal 2,  I also love Portal, but Portal 2 has all the good game mechanics, and not the energy pellets! The engine is newer, and as of a the past few weeks the game has become a decade old, and yet Valve is still patching it. There were issues with the perpetual testing initiative that were fixed with this. I love how mod-able Portal 2 is, and additionally love the lack of a need to mod for single chambers that can be posted on the workshop. Must play "Into the Multiverse" series on there.

很难想象这是10年前的游戏，太令人着迷了——我是说G姐的声音。言归正传，两个简单的传送门的使用就完美地将这游戏的核心玩法发挥到淋漓精致的地步，不得不令人惊叹，代入感很强，游玩体验极佳。

top

If you enjoyed Portal, Portal 2 will CERTAINLY be a big hit for you! Portal 2 has all of Portal's puzzle challenge while introducing you to more characters and witty humor. I instantly was enamored by the beauty of the game-- from lovable character personalities to even more puzzle mechanics and areas to explore, Portal 2 definitely is a worthy successor to the original game.

Oh, and if you're one who prefers to solve things with friends, I'd say the co-op mode is definitely a fun thing to try out!
I give it a good review because it let me shoot holes in the walls and go through them.

Mnoha lidí tuto hru nemusí, protože je logická, ale hra má také zábavný, dobrodružný a geniálně vymyšlený příběh. Hra obsahuje také co-op, můžeté hrát mapy od hráčů nebo nějaké vytvořit a některé ani o logice nejsou. Je to má druhá nejoblíbenější hra na steamu.

There are few things more wonderful than the process of getting into the rules of a universe, learning it all towards a "neo like" matrix moment. This game, including its predecessor, allows for such a thing to happen to you.

... until you go co-op, and it presents yet another wonderful opportunity.

You will not regret playing this game.
